newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Westmont to sell stake in shipping firm.
newsitem.headline: Westmont to sell stake in shipping firm.

text.p: Malaysia's Westmont Industries Bhd said on Wednesday it has agreed to sell its entire 51 percent shareholding in a Malaysian shipping company for 23.5 million ringgit in cash.
Westmont said in a statement that the stake in Perkapalan Mesra Sdn Bhd will be sold to private firm, Globaltech Sdn Bhd.
Perkapalan Mesra is involved in providing shipping services and building of vessels.
Westmont said proceeds from the sale would be utilised to repay borrowings and for working capital.
The disposal would enable the company to re-allocate its resources towards its core activities of energy and offshore fabrication, it said.
